articles.title: Temp-sensing smart building material changes color to save energy ... - eeNews Europe
articles.description: Researchers at the University of Chicago’s Pritzker School of Molecular Engineering (PME) say they have designed a building material that changes its infrared color — and how much heat it absorbs or emits — based on the outside temperature.
